title: ResolvePackageNotFound
body:
**Your Operating system and DeepLabCut version**

Please state your operating system, env, and which version of DeepLabCut you are using.
Example: Ubuntu 16.04 LTS, with an Anaconda Env, & DeepLabCut1.x or 2.x.
Windows10 using the newest DeepLabCut version
**Describe the problem**

A clear and concise description of what the problem is.
when I was trying to create the conda environment using dlc-windowsGPU, I go the following error message:

C:\Users\analysis\DeepLabCut\conda-environments>conda env create -f dlc-windowsGPU.yaml
Warning: you have pip-installed dependencies in your environment file, but you do not list pip itself as one of your conda dependencies.  Conda may not use the correct pip to install your packages, and they may end up in the wrong place.  Please add an explicit pip dependency.  I'm adding one for you, but still nagging you.
Collecting package metadata (repodata.json): done
Solving environment: failed

ResolvePackageNotFound:
  - msvc_runtime

**Additional context**
I have followed the installation guide and installed NVIDIA driver, CUDA and visual studio.
Before I tried to create the dlc-windowsGPU environment, I have once used the dlc-winowsCPU environment and everything works, however, followed the installation of these drivers, when I tried to create the dlc-windowsCPU environment, the same error message was given.

Thank you very much.

Best,
Mingran
